title: The T(y)ranny
description: "we must not cavortw/ ‘goblin’/gobbling‘men’ we must notdrink from theirdirt bowels of sugar"Alison Rumfitt's debut poetry pamphlet is about transness and vaginas and bodily autonomy. In the centrepiece, she imagines the experiences of trans women in a dystopia akin to Handmaid's Tale, investigating their absence, and in doing so builds both a moving narrative and an in-depth criticism of Margaret Atwood.
author: Alison Rumfitt
